Entries.default: "As long as we keep Ed√©r quiet, this just might work."
"You want to play pirates? Let's play pirates."
"I hope you have a plan for when someone sees through this charade. We would have an easier time playing Aedyre diplomats!"
"Be walking casual, cap. No, more casual."
"Good, they bought it. Now let's try not to blow our cover."
"Got to be a way up."
"It is smart to take the covert approach, though a part of me wishes we could flush these rats from this Vailian fortress."
"Ain't never snuck into Deadlight before. Never had call. Be keeping a weather eye peeled for a way up."
"Now we sneak up to the fort. Hunt for a way in."
"So much for the subtle approach."
"Time to drown some sea rats, captain."
"Perhaps the direct approach is not the most likely to succeed, but di verus, it is the best way to flush these rats out."
"Shit, captain. Suppose it be the hard and bloody route then."
"Shall we pillage the pillagers, captain?"
"You see angry pirates. I see souls rotted on the vine."
"Couple more of those, they're gonna start to think we're up to something."
"At least they asked us nicely this time."
"Even pirates are mindful enough to catch on if we keep this up. We should be more careful."
"Right wonder they ain't strung you up, cap. Best not be pressing your fortune."
"You did not notice our escort's wandering hands, I'm sure."
"Too many times and I reckon one of them's going to sound the alarm."
"So much for the subtle approach."
"Must be dinner time."
"Either it's someone's birthday or we need to arm up. Maybe both."
"That sounds like an alarm. Did you know you would be fighting an entire pirate's den today, Watcher?"
"Fuck. Me. That loud honking horn be meaning we got a fight on our hands, folks."
"A curious way to announce guests, ekera?"
"Does that mean they're on to us?"
"This should keep them busy."
"Surprised it ain't happened sooner. Still, worth be getting a move on while eyes be averted."
"While everyone's gawking, we ought to sneak up stairs."
"Is it just me, or are they all staring at us?"
"Nothing like winning a contest when you want to keep a low profile."
"Have fun nursing your hangover while the rest of us get to work."
"Abydon's iron scrote, cap! You be the right hard bastard I took you for after all!"
Entries.female: "Abydon's iron scrote, cap! You be the hard livered lassie I took you for after all!"

Entries.default: "Enjoy your liquid courage, captain!"
"That's sure to call a guard down. We'd best make for it while they're occupied."
"Anything this closely guarded must lead to something important."
"Benweth be behind these doors, no doubt bout it."
"If it's locked tight, it must lead deeper into the fort."
"Be spying them crates on that there crane, cap? Them the casks of rum we be after."
"That's the crane with the rum. Right?"
"Things have certainly gotten lively."
"I am amazed these people ever have time for piracy between their parties."
"Ain't no crime in having a drink or two, captain. What do you say?"
"I say I am tempted to join them and begin a new life."
"It sure is nice when folks kick back and have a good time."
"A shameful waste of a harpsichord."
"Now there's a showman."
"I should go to more concerts."
"Merla, I bet he never expected he would go out like that."
"Benweth were twice a twat, but that bastard could spin a right fancy tune."
"At least he ended on a high note."
"Gruesome."
"Brig be just past here, cap. Hope you got your head set straight bout this."
"This here must be the brig."
"This is going to be loud, isn't it?"
"Hey, I wanna sound the horn, if you're not gonna do it."
"This horn don't bring Benweth out, the bastard's like as not already dead."
"Before you sound that thing, let me cover my ears."
"This is about to go badly."
"That's going to cause a ruckus."
"Guard blows one of them horns, cap, we all be getting blown. Up, I mean."
"Don't let them blow that horn!"
"Usually there'd be a switch or a fella you can threaten to open it."
"Ain't setting sail without getting that door open. Bound to be a lever round here somewhere!"
"Got to be a lever nearby, right?"
"Forge ain't far from here, right up them stairs. Got a particular smell, it does."
"Deadlight's powder be north of here. The brig be to the south."
